str2: Then, at that time. From ho and hote; the when, i.e. At the time that.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I wake, arouse, (b) I raise up. Probably akin to the base of agora; to waken, i.e. Rouse.
On, to, against, on the basis of, at.
Probably from etho; a race, i.e. A tribe; specially, a foreign one.
From basileus; properly, royalty, i.e. rule, or a realm.
